formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: SEND TEXT "<text to send>" Sends the given text on a channel. Most channels do not support the transmission of text. Returns 0 if text is sent, or if the channel does not support text transmission. Returns -1 only on error/hangup. Text consisting of greater than one word should be placed in quotes since the command only accepts a single argument.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,3 +4,4 @@ support text transmission. Returns -1 only on error/hangup. Text consisting of greater than one word should be placed in quotes since the command only accepts a single argument. + Runs Dead : No
